messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] 11 y/o bowels
messages.msgSnippet: ... Yes, we had discussed this as the doctor had mentioned this to the mom. Her best conclusion on this was his father and her were divorced but still friends
messages.messageBody:
> From: Sharon Rudd <bearspawprint@...>
>Subject: ll year old bowels
>Sometimes, unbeknownst to the good doc there is a
>control issue or some sort going on.
>________________________________________________________________________

Yes, we had discussed this as the doctor had mentioned this to the mom.
Her best conclusion on this was his father and her were divorced but
still friends - dad was close and remained close to son ...
then dad became very ill with hepatitis .. was sentenced to death
this child had walked that scary road with dad as the mom let the
ex stay with her so she could care for him thru this ...
ended up thru some new experimental drug he is not cured but in
remission which was unbelievable as bad as he was but she feels
between the divorce and then his dads severe illness this may have
triggered it in the lil guy ...

They also looked into the spinal issues etc and she took him for
alignment checks etc ... that seemed to check out okay ...

Who knows exactly why etc ... ?





~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~
~ Rita ~ of WA
